quiz.question: Which term describes eating more calories than you expend?
Which fatty acids are essential because the body cannot synthesize them?
What do Atwater factors estimate in nutrition science?
options: Physiological energy yield per gram of macronutrients
quiz.answer: Physiological energy yield per gram of macronutrients

quiz.question: What is the simplest way to reduce empty calories in a diet?
Which macronutrient typically has the highest thermic effect after eating?

Which population factor generally increases basal metabolic rate?

Which micronutrient contributes no calories to the diet?
Which measurement combines caloric content and nutrient quality to evaluate foods?
Which policy-driven label change helps consumers identify foods contributing excess caloric sugars?
Which food label component helps compare nutrients between products easily?
options: Serving size and calories per serving
quiz.answer: Serving size and calories per serving
